sentences.sContent: It's sheer folly to build nuclear power stations in a country that has dozens of earthquakes every year.
sentences.sCn: 在一个每年发生几十起地震的国家建立核电站实在愚蠢。

trans.tranCn: 愚蠢； 愚蠢的想法或做法
trans.tranOther: If you say that a particular action or way of behaving is folly or a folly, you mean that it is foolish
